titles.title: Federal Employee Pay Restoration Act
To provide for the compensation of Federal employees furloughed as a result of sequestration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 12/12/2013--Introduced. Federal Employee Pay Restoration Act - Requires federal employees who were furloughed as a result of the presidential sequestration order dated March 1, 2013, to be compensated at their standard rate of compensation for the period of such furlough.
